entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 07:27 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: W 30 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
